Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: Pihi/b m~m/i n~te V] v~iwt a~riounai neman qen tekmetouro
O True Lamb of God the Father, have mercy upon us in Your kingdom.
ايها الحمل الحقيقي الذي لله الآب اصنع معنا رحمة في ملكوتك
Rwf gar m~pekiwt etoi m~meyre qarok je n~yok pe pas/ri a~nok aij~vok m~voou
For the mouth of Your Father testifies about You, saying “You are my Son, today I have begotten You.”
لأن فم أبيك يشهد لك أنك هو ابن العلي وأنا اليوم ولدتك.

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: Je aumici nan n~oua~lou: au] nan n~ous/ri: v/et e~retefar,/: ,/ hijen tefnahbi
For unto us a Child is born, unto us a Son is given, whose Rule is upon His shoulder.
انه ولد لنا ولد واعطينا ابنا الذي رئاسته علي منكبيه
V] v/etjor: n~exouciact/c: ouoh piaggeloc n~te pinis] n~co[ni.
God, the mighty Ruler, and the Messenger of great counsel.
الإله القوي المتسلط وملاك المشورة العظمي.

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: <ere ]ve m~beri: etafsai nan e~bol n~q/tc: n~je pir/ n~te ]dikeo~cun/: P[oic n~te ]k~t/cic t/rc.
Hail to the new heaven, from which the Sun of Righteousness, the Lord of all creation, has shined upon us…
السلام للسماء الجديدة، التي أشرق منها، شمس البر، رب جميع البَرِية

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: <ere B/yleem: t~polic n~nip~rov/t/c: y/etaumec Pi,~rictoc n~q/tc: pimahc~nau n~Adam.
Hail to Bethlehem, the city of the prophets, in which Christ was born, the Second Adam.
السلام لبيت لحم مدينة الأنبياء التي ولد فيها المسيح آدم الثاني.
